item.title: Ricing Fedora i3
item.author: dajhub
item.description: This brief article looks at installing i3 on Fedora and some basic theming/ricing to improve on Fedora’s pretty bare bones look (see the image below)!! To get started we firstly need to install i3. 1.0 Installing i3 on Fedora The download for Fedora’s i3 spin can be found on their “spins” page: https://fedoraproject.org/spins/i3/download . To install Fedora i3 you will need to transfer the downloaded file to a bootable medium, which is usually an USB stick.
